item.title: Common Elasticsearch CURL Errors
item.description: GOAL: The following are common curl errors which surface in context to Elasticsearch but do not necessarily indicate an issue with its service vs how the client-side request was made. Errors are organized by networking > certificates > Elasticsearch layers. routing Examples: (Could not retrieve the Elasticsearch version due to a system or network error - unable to continue., Unable to connect to Elasticsearch at localhost:9200, No living connections). connection refused $ curl https://myElasticsearchURL.
